#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{

    int a;

    while(scanf("%d",&a)!=EOF)
    {
    int high;
    int low;
    if(a > 999 && a < 10000)
    {
    high = a/100;
    low = a%100;


    if(high == 01 || high == 0 ||high == 16 || high == 81 || low== 01 || low == 0 ||low == 16 || low == 81)
        cout << "1" << endl;
    else
        cout << "-1" << endl;
    }
    else
        cout << "-1" << endl;
    }
}
